thread.title: Okowa reshuffles cabinet, moves Okenyi out of Lands, Survey
thread.title_full: Okowa reshuffles cabinet, moves Okenyi out of Lands, Survey

author: adekunle
title: Okowa reshuffles cabinet, moves Okenyi out of Lands, Survey
text:
Home » News » Okowa reshuffles cabinet, moves Okenyi out of Lands, Survey Okowa reshuffles cabinet, moves Okenyi out of Lands, Survey On 10:12 pm In News by adekunle Comments 
By Festus Ahon ASABA-DELTA State Governor, Senator Ifeanyi Okowa, Wednesday night carried out a minor cabinet reshuffle, moving the Commissioner for Lands and Survey, Chief Dan Okenyi to the the Directorate of Arts, Culture and Tourism. 
Okowa in a statement by his Chief Press Secretary, Mr Charles Aniagwu, said Mr Ernest Ogwezzy formerly of Arts, Culture and Tourism would now take charge as Commissioner for Special Duties. 
According to the statement, Mr Chuks Ossai formerly of Special Duties would now take charge of the ministry of Lands and Surveys, adding that “the reshuffling is with immediate effect”. adekunle
